pose_format.utils.openpose_135 module

Functions:

load_openpose_135_directory(*args, **kwargs)

Loads OpnePose data from a directory and returns a Pose object.
pose_format.utils.openpose_135.load_openpose_135_directory(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Loads OpnePose data from a directory and returns a Pose object.

The function reads Openpose data and modifies body data and confidence to contain only first 135 components. It then updates header components to OpenPose components.

Parameters:

  • *args – Variable length argument list.

  • **kwargs – arbitrary keyword arguments.

Returns:

modified Pose object with body data and confidence from the first 135 components

Return type:

Pose

Note

The function assumes that the input directory contains “OpenPose data” compatible with the Pose data structure, and body data and confidence matrices must have at least 135 components, no less!
